page.title: 16 News Articles
page.content:
On June 18th 1985 we went into the Express and Echo office in Exeter to find out all the news about Silverton since January 1985. Here are some of the more interesting items discovered.
In January Mr Priestley, a local artist, held a one_man exhibition in the Northcott Theatre, Exeter. Mr Priestley lives in Silverton.
Another item appeared in January when the Breeze family moved into the Three Tuns inn, Silverton, one of Devon's most popular and picturesque country pubs.
On January the 24th there was an article on Mr R. Maxwell-Hyslop M.P. concerning the local goverment bill (Access to information).
